popup.title: GitHub Issue Linker
popup.helpText: Navigate to a page with issue keys to see them here
popup.activateConfirm: Activating the extension requires reloading the page to detect issue keys. Do you want to continue?

language.title: Language
language.description: Choose your preferred language for the extension interface.

mappingDialog.description: Configure how issue keys should be linked for a specific repository.

trackerUrl.label: Issue Tracker URL
trackerUrl.help: Your issue tracker URL (must use HTTPS)

keyPrefix.label: Key Prefix
keyPrefix.help: Issue key prefix (e.g., WMS for WMS-123, or api for api-456)

validation.repositoryFormat: Repository name must be in format "owner/repo"
validation.keyPrefixFormat: Key prefix must start with a letter and contain only letters, numbers, underscores, and hyphens

notifications.welcomeMessage: Configure your issue tracker settings to get started.
